Package client.KI_Zeug

Class MessageHandlerAI

java.lang.Object
client.model.MessageHandler
client.KI_Zeug.MessageHandlerAI
public class MessageHandlerAI extends MessageHandler
Author:
Viktoria This is a message handler for the AI that overrides some of the methods from client MessageHandler. The current stand of the AI is that it chooses random cards, doesn't buy upgrade cards, doesn't choose a reboot direction.

  • Field Summary
